text:
September 29, 1958
Mr* Jesses 17* Jacobs
Assistant, Appraisal Services
Cincinnati Public Schools
608 East McMillan Street
Cincinnati 6, Ohio
Dear Mr. Jacobs*
I'm afraid we have no copies of any formal studies of the type
dene at Denver. X believe they may have had reference to our Fact
Sheet Service, of which a sample is attached. These are available to
all members, along with numerous other items, at $7.50 per year.
Sincerely,
Harry J. Skcxmia
Executive Director
